resources.string: This is by far the best recipe I\'ve ever made and it turned out perfect!
A++ Decadently Delicious! I\'ve tried many recipes from this site, all of them pleasing. But this is the first time I\'ve ever been so inspired by one to write a review!

Believe the hype. I made this for the first time for a dinner party I had last week - mostly because I wanted to see what all the fuss was about. And it did not disappoint. Some people were begging for the recipe. The others were saying it was the best thing they had ever tasted. There were riots over who was going to get the last piece. Truly spectacular.

I followed this recipe as it\'s written, and it came out awful for me. And unfortunately it was for my first thanksgiving dinner. My guests pretended to like it but I saw the disgust in their faces. I hate my life.
